channel.title: The C Programming Language on Andy Sukowski-Bang
channel.description: Recent content in The C Programming Language on Andy Sukowski-Bang

item.title: Datatypes
item.description: The type of a variable determines how much space it occupies in storage and how the bit pattern stored is interpreted.

item.title: `if`...`else` statements
item.description: An `if` statement can be followed by an optional else statement, which executes when the Boolean expression is false.
